name: Doggo Adventure - Easter Demo
description:
Demo V1.1 Changelog:

- Added icon and changed exe name

- Balanced Boss and Torchy

The demo of an amazing game. No it wasn't released on Easter because I was impatient. 

Controls: 

Keyboard:

Left and Right or A and D - Move

Z or W or Up - Jump

Controller:

Left Stick or D Pad - Move

X/A or Up on D Pad - Jump

You can wall jump too btw.

Enjoy the best game in the world*!

*not guaranteed to be the best game in the world
